rootCause: KiBot executed inside environments that only shipped KiCad 7 from the default apt repositories. Those builds cannot open the KiCad 9 project, so every export attempt crashed with 'Error loading PCB file' during the noted dates.
resolution: Extend scripts/checks.sh to register the official KiCad 9 repository (or install the Homebrew cask) whenever electronics files change. The script now provisions the correct major version automatically and fails fast if the upgrade cannot be completed.
